When two astronauts scheduled for a mission to the Moon are killed in mysterious circumstances, Vincent suspects that the Invaders are behind the murders.
A newlywed couple are involved in a car accident that sees a truck spill mysterious crystals onto the road that react with the atmosphere and kill them.
When a laboratory owner uncovers an Invader is leasing his premises, he steals and hides valuable information from the alien. Can Vincent recover it?
When a woman who was found dead after she fell from a horse miraculously turns up alive and the man who discovered her corpse disappears, Vincent investigates.
Vincent finally obtains tangible proof of the alien invasion when he captures a flying saucer after fighting off a group of Invader guards.

programmes.show_name: Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger
programmes.show_description: Swashbuckling fantasy with Patrick Wayne. Sinbad the Sailor battles evil witches, ghouls and monsters while assisting a crown prince who was turned into a baboon by his wicked stepmother. (1977)
Disaster drama with Charlton Heston. In the aftermath of a catastrophic earthquake in Los Angeles, an architect helping with the rescue effort searches the smouldering ruins for his wife. (1974)
Tense Western drama. A US Marshal is sent to the town of Dogwood Pass to catch a ruthless killer, where a corrupt mayor and an unhinged sheriff stand in the way of justice. (2017)

Fantasy thriller with Nicolas Cage. A vengeful father breaks out of Hell to hunt down the leader of a satanic cult who murdered his daughter and plans to sacrifice her child. (2010)
Deep blue horror. A crew of an underwater nuclear base fight for their lives when an alien menace at the bottom of the ocean is disturbed. (1988)
